summary: This command finds processes named "paddlespeech", gets their process IDs, and then kills them using the KILL signal.

details.comment: This command finds processes named "paddlespeech", gets their process IDs, and then kills them using the KILL signal.
details.content: ps aux | grep -v grep | grep paddlespeech | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -iabc kill -s KILL abc
